title: Strange Matter
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Casual restaurant, venue, and arcade. Menu is 70% vegan with dishes using jackfruit and mock meats. Daily specials, vegan breakfast biscuits and gravy, and more. Vegan cheese always offered. The arcade features old school games (like Mario Brothers). Live music, hip college atmosphere.
